Reviews.Title: “One of the best places in Berlin to stay”
Reviews.Author: cybergabi
Reviews.Content: twice december 2003 october 2010 wasnt disappointed time wonderful quiet oasis backyard buzzing vibrant district comfortable spacious clean nice people run includes widely organic german breakfast buffet free wifi beautiful summer terrace rates competitive paid night double including breakfast minor downside dont elevator youre handicapped reserve ground floor worth cent spend
